channel.title: Object clicked
channel.description:
Firstly I'd like to establish, I'm very new to clients and they seem very strange to me, but I'm trying to get better at them! :)
I was wondering if there was some sort of way to make the "add a friend" interface show when a certain object is clicked. Originally I thought this would be server-sided, but the opening of the text input interfaces is client-sided. So I was wondering if anyone could tell me some way to open this interface when a particular object within the server is clicked.
All help is appreciated.
Thank you :)

item.title: Object clicked
item.dc:creator: @guthix1pker guthix1pker
item.description:
@guthix1pker wrote:

its server sided - clickingbuttons.java.

Read full topic
